biotools.summary: MYBS (Mining Yeast Binding Sites) is a tool for mapping Transcription factors (TFs) and their binding sites (TFBSs) that integrates both experimentally verified (ChIP-chip data) and predicted position weight matrixes (PWMs) from several databases.

bioschemas.name: MYBS
bioschemas.summary: MYBS (Mining Yeast Binding Sites) is a tool for mapping Transcription factors (TFs) and their binding sites (TFBSs) that integrates both experimentally verified (ChIP-chip data) and predicted position weight matrixes (PWMs) from several databases.
